alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 1:46AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY THROUGH 130 AM MDT... At 1245 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hay Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Hay Springs, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road, Mount Maria, and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 92. Highway 250 near mile marker 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
